item.description:
Are you tired of hearing yourself say "I'm going to do a deal this year" and haven't. Or do you find yourself saying "If I could just find the right investors" but can't?  Perhaps you "Should have" made a deal but all the NAY sayers turned you off to the investment?

 

Haven't, Can't, Didn't, Won't, Should have, What if........  What if we omit these words from our vocabulary and start believing in ourselves.  Jeremy Bailey did!

 

Listen to Jeremy Bailey, long time REIA Member, real estate owner and investor as he shares his knowledge of how he became a real estate investor. What sets him apart from the likes of you and me? I'll tell you what, Jeremy took action! Join us tomorrow night in Taunton as Jeremy shows us the steps he took to becoming a successful real estate investor.

 

Note: You will find us upstairs on the 2nd floor in Taunton 2 & 3

Hope to see you new investors, old investors, contractors, rehabbers, wholesalers at the meeting in Taunton. Add to your support group by coming Tuesday March 19th. Network with the right people!

Net working begins at 6:30, meeting starts at 7pm. See you there.

group.name: EMREIA-Eastern Mass Real Estate Investors Assoc.

item.name: EMREIA Monthly Meeting in Taunton
